bug.author: ThomasDelteil
bug.summary: Trying to export model archive in same directory as model, infinite loop
bug.description:
Related to that: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/multi-model-server/issues/267>#267</denchmark-link>
It would be good if MMS detected that rather than filling up my hard disk with copies of itself ðŸ˜„ model-archiver --model-name crepe -f --model-path . --handler gluon_crepe:crepe_inference --runtime python --export-path ./export
